name: Betrayal of Lanka
description:
This game follow Lanka a human animal experiment gone wrong, but cute. Follow Lanka through 5 levels of puzzles.

A team of Game Developers and Animators decided to try a game jam together. This was oure first game jam together, we had alot of fun!

Team consists of:

Jan Kristian Fisera: Project Lead, Release Manager, BP & C++ Programmer, User Interface
Tadeas Andel: Project Coordinator, Concept Design, Environment Art & Design, BP & C++ Programmer, Sounds, Technical Animations
Jakub Rak: Character, Rigging, BP Programmer, Environment Art & Design, Narrative Design, Technical Animator
Alena Hejtmanova: Concept Design, Environment Art & Design, Character Animations, Art, Props, Movie, Level Design
Petr Vlach: Character Animations, Art, Props, Sounds, QA
Petr Misak: Movie

Character was made by us.
All animations were made by us. Some props and textures were made by us.
All levels were composed by us.
All logic was written by us.
Using POLYGON Town Pack for low poly assets.
Using Unreal Engine 5 Preview 2
